Class GameController

java.lang.Object
com.comp2042.controller.GameController
All Implemented Interfaces:
InputEventListener
public class GameController extends Object implements InputEventListener
Handles the game logic between GuiController and Board. It implements InputEventListener to respond to user and timer inputs.

  • Constructor Details

    • GameController

      public GameController(GuiController c)
      Constructs the GameController and sets up the initial game state. It connectss the GUI controller and initializes the board, score, and level bindings.
      Parameters:
      c - GuiController to manage view layer

  • Method Details

    • onDownEvent

      public DownData onDownEvent(MoveEvent event)
      Checks whether the brick can drop or not. If the current brick can't move, then check if there have any rows. If there have completed rows then clear them and add score.
      Specified by:
      onDownEvent in interface InputEventListener
      Parameters:
      event - a MoveEvent object containing source of event
      Returns:
      a DownData object containing row clear results and updated view data
